fields.headline: Pick of the week: Theatre
fields.bodyText: Pygmalion Old Vic, SW1 Peter Hall's lively production of George Bernard Shaw's classic social comedy enters its final week. The Chalk Garden Donmar Warehouse, WC2 Wonderful revival of Enid Bagnold's eccentric domestic melodrama. Final performances. Under The Blue Sky Duke Of York's, WC2 David Eldridge's engaging drama about six teachers and their relationships. Brief Encounter Cineworld Haymarket, SW1 Kneehigh Theatre's inventive and charming take on the classic weepie film. Elaine Stritch At Liberty Shaw Theatre, NW1 Broadway legend Stritch returns with her wondrous one-woman show. Final week.
